page.title: 09VISITING SERVICES TO RAASAY
page.content: ON RAASAY THERE ARE THREE SERVICES WHICH COME OVER ON THE FERRY. THE LIBRARY THE BANK AND THE DOCTOR.THE LIBRARY COMES OVER FROM PORTREE EVERY FOURTH WEDNESDAY MORNING SO THAT YOU CAN EXCHANGE BOOKS OR TAKE SOME OUT.IT STOPS FIRST AT THE VILLAGE THEN IT MOVES ON TO CLACHAN AND ITS LAST STOP IS AT THE SCHOOL. THE BANK COMES OVER FROM SKYE IT COMES OVER EVERY FIRST FRIDAY ON EVERY MONTH SO THAT YOU CAN TAKE MONEY OUT OR PUT IT IN.IT IS THE ROYAL BANK OF SCOTLAND WHICH COMES OVER.THE TRAVELLING BANK VAN USED TO COME OVER BUT DUE TO FERRY EXPENCE OF THE FERRY FARE THEY NOW SEND A CAR. THE DOCTOR COMES OVER EVERY TWO WEEKS FROM THE GROUP PRACTICE IN PORTREE.HE GOES TO THE SURGERY IN THE VILLAGE WHERE HE HOLDS A CLINIC.
